mapper.sql: a.xh AS "xh", a.zd_xh AS "zdXh", a.fph AS "fph", a.kprq AS "kprq", a.dprq AS "dprq", a.czdm AS "czdm", a.cd_idm AS "cdIdm", a.gg_idm AS "ggIdm", a.drug_name AS "drugName", a.drug_spec AS "drugSpec", a.ypdm AS "ypdm", a.pcxh AS "pcxh", a.sxrq AS "sxrq", a.ph AS "ph", a.ykxs AS "ykxs", a.ypdw AS "ypdw", a.dwxs AS "dwxs", a.rksl AS "rksl", a.czsl AS "czsl", a.ypkl AS "ypkl", a.ypjj AS "ypjj", a.ypfj AS "ypfj", a.ylsj AS "ylsj", a.jjje AS "jjje", a.jxce AS "jxce", a.xgxh AS "xgxh", a.dpbz AS "dpbz", a.mrzbj AS "mrzbj", a.zbqh AS "zbqh", a.zbdw AS "zbdw", a.ypmrkl AS "ypmrkl", a.scrq AS "scrq"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medsto_ypckmx( xh, zd_xh, fph, kprq, dprq, czdm, cd_idm, gg_idm, drug_name, drug_spec, ypdm, pcxh, sxrq, ph, ykxs, ypdw, dwxs, rksl, czsl, ypkl, ypjj, ypfj, ylsj, jjje, jxce, xgxh, dpbz, mrzbj, zbqh, zbdw, ypmrkl, scrq ) VALUES ( #{xh}, #{zdXh}, #{fph}, #{kprq}, #{dprq}, #{czdm}, #{cdIdm}, #{ggIdm}, #{drugName}, #{drugSpec}, #{ypdm}, #{pcxh}, #{sxrq}, #{ph}, #{ykxs}, #{ypdw}, #{dwxs}, #{rksl}, #{czsl}, #{ypkl}, #{ypjj}, #{ypfj}, #{ylsj}, #{jjje}, #{jxce}, #{xgxh}, #{dpbz}, #{mrzbj}, #{zbqh}, #{zbdw}, #{ypmrkl}, #{scrq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE medsto_ypckmx SET xh = #{xh}, zd_xh = #{zdXh}, fph = #{fph}, kprq = #{kprq}, dprq = #{dprq}, czdm = #{czdm}, cd_idm = #{cdIdm}, gg_idm = #{ggIdm}, drug_name = #{drugName}, drug_spec = #{drugSpec}, ypdm = #{ypdm}, pcxh = #{pcxh}, sxrq = #{sxrq}, ph = #{ph}, ykxs = #{ykxs}, ypdw = #{ypdw}, dwxs = #{dwxs}, rksl = #{rksl}, czsl = #{czsl}, ypkl = #{ypkl}, ypjj = #{ypjj}, ypfj = #{ypfj}, ylsj = #{ylsj}, jjje = #{jjje}, jxce = #{jxce}, xgxh = #{xgxh}, dpbz = #{dpbz}, mrzbj = #{mrzbj}, zbqh = #{zbqh}, zbdw = #{zbdw}, ypmrkl = #{ypmrkl}, scrq = #{scrq} WHERE id = #{id}
